doc:
John_Aniston http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/John_Aniston 0 John Anthony Aniston (born Yiannis Antonios Anastasakis , Greek: Γιάννης Αντώνιος Αναστασάκης, July 24, 1933) is an American actor. He is best known for his role as Victor Kiriakis on the NBC daytime drama series Days of Our Lives, which he originated in July 1985 and has played continually since then. He is the father of Jennifer Aniston. John Anthony Aniston (born Yiannis Antonios Anastasakis , Greek: Γιάννης Αντώνιος Αναστασάκης, July 24, 1933) is an American actor. He is best known for his role as Victor Kiriakis on the NBC daytime drama series Days of Our Lives, which he originated in July 1985 and has played continually since then. He is the father of Jennifer Aniston.
